sections.heading: 01|Parent and child relationship defined
sections.text: Effective:April 3, 2024Latest Legislation:House Bill 33 - 135th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDF(A)(1) As used in sections3111.01to3111.85of the Revised Code, "parent and child relationship" means the legal relationship that exists between a chi

sections.heading: the Revised Code deal with non-spousal artificial insemination for the purpose of impregnating a woman so that she can bear a child that she intends to raise as her child
sections.text: These sections do not deal with the artificial insemination of a wife with the semen of her husband or with surrogate motherhood
